Male Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Renal Artery Obstruction
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Narrowing or occlusion of the RENAL ARTERY or arteries. It is due usually to ATHEROSCLEROSIS; FIBROMUSCULAR DYSPLASIA; THROMBOSIS; EMBOLISM, or external pressure. The reduced renal perfusion can lead to renovascular hypertension (HYPERTENSION, RENOVASCULAR).
